jama.gpu

Class GPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • jama.gpu.GPU

  • public class GPU
extends Object

    This is the main class to perform computation on the GPU. Create a GPU via the factory methods create(..)

    Example

     GPU gpu = GPU.create(); // Creates a gpu with the JavaCL.createBestContext()
 FloatMatrix C = gpu.multiplyLocal(A, B);

    Note that this is currently in experimental stadium. You cannot influence
    the parameters of the openCL kernels. So blocksize, workgroupsize and
    localworkgroupsize are hardcoded. This may change in future releases.

    Version:
    2.0.0-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    Nepomuk Seiler

        protected static FloatMatrix zeroPadding(FloatMatrix matrix,

        Returns a padded matrix with width/height of a correct factor determined by the workgroupSize. If the dimensions are already correct the identical matrix is returned.
